caption.p: Effect of essential oil on the differentiation of M. incognita and M. javanica eggs after immersion in test solutions, at the doses of 0, 62.5, 125, 250, 500, 1000, 2000 and 4000 Î¼L/L for 28 days. Bars with the same color followed by the same letter are not significantly different. Error bars represent the standard deviation of mean.
